    from {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(-8px);
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateY(0);
    }
}

@keyframes activeSlide {
    from { transform: scaleY(0); }
    to { transform: scaleY(1); }
}

    }

        position: static;
        opacity: 1;
        visibility: visible;
        transform: none;
        box-shadow: none;
        border: none;
        border-radius: 0;
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.03);
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        max-height: 0;
        overflow: hidden;
        transition: max-height 0.4s ease;
        display: block !important;
    }

        max-height: 800px;

    }

        transform: rotate(180deg);
        color: #FFD700;
    }

    }

/* 1 & 2. Mobile Logo and Icon Alignment Fixes */

        height: 70px; /* Gives the header a fixed, taller height for better spacing */
        align-items: center; /* THIS IS THE KEY FIX for vertical alignment */
    }

        height: 48px; /* Increased from 36px for better visibility */
    }

        align-items: center; /* Ensures all items inside (search, cart, menu) are vertically centered */
    }

</style>
<script>
// ===== AQUADORCY COMPLETE JAVASCRIPT - FIXED VERSION =====
// Global variables
let cartItems = [];
let mobileMenuOpen = false;

// ===== HEADER FUNCTIONALITY =====
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    console.log('Aquadorcy header script loaded - Enhanced Mobile Version');
    
    // Add body class for header spacing
    document.body.classList.add('custom-header-active');
    
    // Initialize all functionality
    initializeMobileMenu();
    initializeSearch();
    initializeCart();
    initializeScrollBehavior();
    initializeKeyboardShortcuts();
    initializeSquarespaceIntegration();
    initializeCustomPerfumeIntegration();
    
    console.log('All Aquadorcy header functionality initialized');
});

// ===== ENHANCED MOBILE MENU FUNCTIONALITY =====
function initializeMobileMenu() {
    const mobileToggle = document.getElementById('mobileToggle');
    const customNav = document.getElementById('customNav');
    
    if (!mobileToggle || !customNav) {
        console.warn('Mobile menu elements not found');
        return;
    }
    
    // Mobile menu toggle
    mobileToggle.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        e.stopPropagation();
        
        if (mobileMenuOpen) {
            closeMobileMenu();
        } else {
            openMobileMenu();
        }
    });
    
    // Handle dropdown toggles on mobile
    const dropdownTriggers = document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown-trigger');
    
    dropdownTriggers.forEach(trigger => {
        trigger.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (window.innerWidth <= 768) {
                e.preventDefault();
                e.stopPropagation();
                
                const navItem = this.parentElement;
                const dropdown = navItem.querySelector('.dropdown');
                const isActive = navItem.classList.contains('active-dropdown');
                
                // Close other dropdowns
                document.querySelectorAll('.nav-item.active-dropdown').forEach(item => {
                    if (item !== navItem) {
                        item.classList.remove('active-dropdown');
                    }
                });
                
                // Toggle current dropdown
                if (isActive) {
                    navItem.classList.remove('active-dropdown');
                } else {
                    navItem.classList.add('active-dropdown');
                    
                    // Ensure dropdown is visible
                    if (dropdown) {
                        dropdown.style.display = 'block';
                        setTimeout(() => {
                            dropdown.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'nearest' });
                        }, 100);
                    }
                }
                
                console.log('Dropdown toggled:', !isActive);
            }
        });
    });
    
    // Close menu when clicking on regular nav links
    document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link:not(.dropdown-trigger)').forEach(link => {
        link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (window.innerWidth <= 768) {
                closeMobileMenu();
            }
        });
    });
    
    // Close menu when clicking on dropdown items
    document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown-item').forEach(item => {
        item.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (window.innerWidth <= 768) {
                closeMobileMenu();
            }
        });
    });
    
    // Close menu when clicking outside
    document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        if (mobileMenuOpen && !e.target.closest('.custom-nav') && !e.target.closest('.mobile-toggle')) {
            closeMobileMenu();
        }
    });
    
    // Handle window resize
    window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
        if (window.innerWidth > 768 && mobileMenuOpen) {
            closeMobileMenu();
        }
    });
    
    console.log('Mobile menu initialized with enhanced functionality');
}

function openMobileMenu() {
    const mobileToggle = document.getElementById('mobileToggle');
    const customNav = document.getElementById('customNav');
    
    mobileMenuOpen = true;
    mobileToggle.classList.add('active');
    customNav.classList.add('mobile-visible', 'active');
    document.body.classList.add('menu-open');
    
    // Ensure nav is displayed
    customNav.style.display = 'block';
    
    // Force reflow
    customNav.offsetHeight;
    
    console.log('Mobile menu opened');
}

function closeMobileMenu() {
    const mobileToggle = document.getElementById('mobileToggle');
    const customNav = document.getElementById('customNav');
    
    mobileMenuOpen = false;
    mobileToggle.classList.remove('active');
    customNav.classList.remove('active');
    document.body.classList.remove('menu-open');
    
    // Hide nav after animation
    setTimeout(() => {
        if (!mobileMenuOpen) {
            customNav.classList.remove('mobile-visible');
            customNav.style.display = '';
        }
    }, 300);
    
    // Close all dropdowns
    document.querySelectorAll('.nav-item.active-dropdown').forEach(item => {
        item.classList.remove('active-dropdown');
    });
    
    console.log('Mobile menu closed');
}

// ===== SEARCH FUNCTIONALITY =====
function initializeSearch() {
    const searchInput = document.getElementById('searchInput');
    const searchBtn = document.getElementById('searchBtn');
    const searchResults = document.getElementById('searchResults');
    
    if (!searchInput || !searchBtn || !searchResults) {
        console.warn('Search elements not found');
        return;
    }
    
    let searchTimeout;
    
    searchInput.addEventListener('input', function() {
        clearTimeout(searchTimeout);
        const query = this.value.trim();
        
        if (query.length < 2) {
            searchResults.classList.remove('active');
            return;
        }
        
        searchTimeout = setTimeout(() => {
            performSearch(query);
        }, 300);
    });
    
    searchBtn.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        const query = searchInput.value.trim();
        if (query) {
            window.location.href = `/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
        }
    });
    
    // Enter key search
    searchInput.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
        if (e.key === 'Enter') {
            const query = this.value.trim();
            if (query) {
                window.location.href = `/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
            }
        }
    });
    
    // Close search results when clicking outside
    document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        if (!e.target.closest('.search-container')) {
            searchResults.classList.remove('active');
        }
    });
    
    console.log('Search functionality initialized');
}

// Default performSearch implementation (will be overridden by global search)
function performSearch(query) {
    // Check if global search is available
    if (window.performSquarespaceSearch) {
        performSquarespaceSearch(query);
    } else {
        performCustomSearch(query);
    }
}

function performSquarespaceSearch(query) {
    const searchResults = document.getElementById('searchResults');
    
    try {
        fetch(`/api/search/ProductItems?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}&limit=10`, {
            method: 'GET',
            headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }
        })
        .then(response => response.json())
        .then(data => {
            if (data && data.items && data.items.length > 0) {
                const results = data.items.map(item => ({
                    title: item.title,
                    price: item.structuredContent?.productVariants?.[0]?.priceMoney?.value 
                           ? `${(item.structuredContent.productVariants[0].priceMoney.value / 100).toFixed(2)}`
                           : 'Price varies',
                    image: item.assetUrl || item.mainImageUrl || '',
                    url: item.fullUrl || '#'
                }));
                
                displaySearchResults(results);
            } else {
                displayNoResults();
            }
        })
        .catch(() => performCustomSearch(query));
    } catch (error) {
        performCustomSearch(query);
    }
}

function performCustomSearch(query) {
    const searchResults = document.getElementById('searchResults');
    const results = [];
    
    // Search through navigation links
    const links = document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/shop/"]');
    const searchTerms = query.toLowerCase().split(' ');
    
    links.forEach(link => {
        const href = link.getAttribute('href');
        const text = link.textContent.toLowerCase();
        
        const matches = searchTerms.some(term => 
            text.includes(term) || href.includes(term)
        );
        
        if (matches && !results.find(r => r.url === href)) {
            results.push({
                title: link.textContent.trim(),
                price: 'View Collection',
                image: '',
                url: href
            });
        }
    });
    
    // Search through page content
    const productElements = document.querySelectorAll('[data-test="product-tile"], .ProductItem, .product-item');
    productElements.forEach(element => {
        const title = element.querySelector('.product-title, .ProductItem-details-title, h1, h2, h3')?.textContent || '';
        const price = element.querySelector('.price, .product-price, .sqs-money-native')?.textContent || '';
        const image = element.querySelector('img')?.src || '';
        const link = element.querySelector('a')?.href || '';
        
        if (title.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase())) {
            results.push({
                title: title.trim(),
                price: price.trim() || 'Price varies',
                image: image,
                url: link
            });
        }
    });
    
    const limitedResults = results.slice(0, 8);
    
    if (limitedResults.length > 0) {
        displaySearchResults(limitedResults);
    } else {
        displayNoResults();
    }
}

function displaySearchResults(results) {
    const searchResults = document.getElementById('searchResults');
    
    searchResults.innerHTML = results.map(item => `
        <a href="${item.url}" class="search-result-item">
            ${item.image ? `<img src="${item.image}" alt="${item.title}" class="search-result-image" onerror="this.style.display='none'">` : ''}
            <div class="search-result-content">
                <div class="search-result-title">${item.title}</div>
                <div class="search-result-price">${item.price}</div>
            </div>
        </a>
    `).join('');
    
    searchResults.classList.add('active');
}

function displayNoResults() {
    const searchResults = document.getElementById('searchResults');
    
    searchResults.innerHTML = `
        <div class="search-result-item">
            <div class="search-result-content">
                <div class="search-result-title">No results found</div>
                <div class="search-result-price">Try a different search term</div>
            </div>
        </div>
    `;
    
    searchResults.classList.add('active');
}

// ===== CART FUNCTIONALITY =====
function initializeCart() {
    const cartToggle = document.getElementById('cartToggle');
    const cartSidebar = document.getElementById('cartSidebar');
    const cartOverlay = document.getElementById('cartOverlay');
    const cartClose = document.getElementById('cartClose');
    
    if (!cartToggle || !cartSidebar || !cartOverlay || !cartClose) {
        console.warn('Cart elements not found');
        return;
    }
    
    cartToggle.addEventListener('click', openCart);
    cartClose.addEventListener('click', closeCart);
    cartOverlay.addEventListener('click', closeCart);
    
    // Load cart from storage
    loadCartFromStorage();
    updateCartDisplay();
    
    console.log('Cart functionality initialized');
}

function openCart() {
    document.getElementById('cartSidebar').classList.add('open');
    document.getElementById('cartOverlay').classList.add('active');
    document.body.classList.add('cart-open');
    console.log('Cart opened');
}

function closeCart() {
    document.getElementById('cartSidebar').classList.remove('open');
    document.getElementById('cartOverlay').classList.remove('active');
    document.body.classList.remove('cart-open');
    console.log('Cart closed');
}

function extractPrice(priceString) {
    if (!priceString) return 0;
    
    let cleanPrice = priceString.replace(/[^\d.,]/g, '');
    
    if (cleanPrice.includes(',')) {
        const parts = cleanPrice.split(',');
        if (parts.length === 2 && parts[1].length === 2) {
            cleanPrice = cleanPrice.replace(',', '.');
        } else {
            cleanPrice = cleanPrice.replace(/,/g, '');
        }
    }
    
    const price = parseFloat(cleanPrice);
    return isNaN(price) ? 0 : price;
}

function addToCart(productId, title, price, image, variant = '') {
    const numericPrice = extractPrice(price);
    
    const existingItem = cartItems.find(item => 
        item.productId === productId && item.variant === variant
    );
    
    if (existingItem) {
        existingItem.quantity += 1;
    } else {
        cartItems.push({
            productId,
            title,
            price: numericPrice,
            image,
            variant,
            quantity: 1
        });
    }
    
    updateCartDisplay();
    saveCartToStorage();
    showCartAnimation();
    
    console.log('Added to cart:', { title, price: numericPrice, variant });
}

function removeFromCart(productId, variant = '') {
    cartItems = cartItems.filter(item => 
        !(item.productId === productId && item.variant === variant)
    );
    updateCartDisplay();
    saveCartToStorage();
}

function updateQuantity(productId, variant, newQuantity) {
    const item = cartItems.find(item => 
        item.productId === productId && item.variant === variant
    );
    
    if (item) {
        if (newQuantity <= 0) {
            removeFromCart(productId, variant);
        } else {
            item.quantity = newQuantity;
            updateCartDisplay();
            saveCartToStorage();
        }
    }
}

function updateCartDisplay() {
    const cartCount = document.getElementById('cartCount');
    const cartBody = document.getElementById('cartBody');
    const cartFooter = document.getElementById('cartFooter');
    const cartTotal = document.getElementById('cartTotal');
    
    const totalItems = cartItems.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.quantity, 0);
    const totalPrice = cartItems.reduce((sum, item) => sum + (item.price * item.quantity), 0);
    
    cartCount.textContent = totalItems;
    cartTotal.textContent = `${totalPrice.toFixed(2)}`;
    
    if (cartItems.length === 0) {
        cartBody.innerHTML = `
            <div class="empty-cart">
                <div class="empty-cart-icon">
                    <svg width="40" height="40" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5">
                        <path d="M9 3V1a1 1 0 011-1h4a1 1 0 011 1v2"/>
                        <path d="M8 5h8l1 2v12a2 2 0 01-2 2H9a2 2 0 01-2-2V7l1-2z"/>
                        <path d="M10 8h4"/>
                        <path d="M9 12h6"/>
                        <circle cx="12" cy="16" r="1.5"/>
                    </svg>
                </div>
                <h3>Your cart is empty</h3>
                <p>Add some amazing perfumes to get started!</p>
            </div>
        `;
        cartFooter.style.display = 'none';
    } else {
        cartFooter.style.display = 'block';
        
        cartBody.innerHTML = cartItems.map(item => `
            <div class="cart-item">
                ${item.image ? `<img src="${item.image}" alt="${item.title}" class="cart-item-image" onerror="this.style.display='none'">` : ''}
                <div class="cart-item-details">
                    <h4 class="cart-item-title">${item.title}</h4>
                    ${item.variant ? `<p class="cart-item-variant">${item.variant}</p>` : ''}
                    <div class="cart-item-price">${(item.price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}</div>
                </div>
                <div class="cart-item-actions">
                    <div class="quantity-controls">
                        <button class="qty-btn" onclick="updateQuantity('${item.productId}', '${item.variant}', ${item.quantity - 1})"></button>
                        <input type="number" class="qty-input" value="${item.quantity}" readonly>
                        <button class="qty-btn" onclick="updateQuantity('${item.productId}', '${item.variant}', ${item.quantity + 1})">+</button>
                    </div>
                    <button class="remove-btn" onclick="removeFromCart('${item.productId}', '${item.variant}')"></button>
                </div>
            </div>
        `).join('');
    }
    
    // Enhance custom perfume display after update
    setTimeout(() => {
        enhanceCustomPerfumeDisplay();
    }, 100);
}

function enhanceCustomPerfumeDisplay() {
    const cartBody = document.getElementById('cartBody');
    if (cartBody) {
        const cartItemElements = cartBody.querySelectorAll('.cart-item');
        
        cartItemElements.forEach(element => {
            const titleElement = element.querySelector('.cart-item-title');
            if (titleElement && titleElement.textContent.includes('Custom Perfume')) {
                // Add special styling
                element.style.background = 'linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(212, 175, 55, 0.05) 0%, transparent 100%)';
                element.style.border = '1px solid rgba(212, 175, 55, 0.2)';
                element.style.borderRadius = '8px';
                element.style.position = 'relative';
                
                // Add custom badge if not exists
                if (!element.querySelector('.custom-perfume-badge')) {
                    const badge = document.createElement('div');
                    badge.className = 'custom-perfume-badge';
                    badge.innerHTML = ' CUSTOM';
                    badge.style.cssText = `
                        position: absolute;
                        top: 8px;
                        right: 8px;
                        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #D4AF37 0%, #FFA500 100%);
                        color: #000;
                        padding: 3px 8px;
                        border-radius: 10px;
                        font-size: 9px;
                        font-weight: 700;
                        letter-spacing: 0.5px;
                        z-index: 10;
                    `;
                    element.appendChild(badge);
                }
                
                // Style the variant text
                const variantEl = element.querySelector('.cart-item-variant');
                if (variantEl) {
                    variantEl.style.fontSize = '11px';
                    variantEl.style.color = '#666';
                    variantEl.style.marginTop = '4px';
                    variantEl.style.lineHeight = '1.4';
                }
            }
        });
    }
}

function saveCartToStorage() {
    try {
        localStorage.setItem('aquadorcyCart', JSON.stringify(cartItems));
    } catch (e) {
        console.warn('Could not save cart to localStorage');
    }
}

function loadCartFromStorage() {
    try {
        const savedCart = localStorage.getItem('aquadorcyCart');
        if (savedCart) {
            cartItems = JSON.parse(savedCart);
        }
    } catch (e) {
        console.warn('Could not load cart from localStorage');
        cartItems = [];
    }
}

function showCartAnimation() {
    const cartIcon = document.getElementById('cartToggle');
    cartIcon.style.animation = 'pulse 0.6s ease';
    setTimeout(() => {
        cartIcon.style.animation = '';
    }, 600);
}

function proceedToCheckout() {
    window.location.href = '/checkout';
}

// ===== SQUARESPACE INTEGRATION =====
function initializeSquarespaceIntegration() {
    // Monitor for Squarespace add to cart button clicks
    document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        const addToCartBtn = e.target.closest('.sqs-add-to-cart-button, .product-add-to-cart-button, .ProductItem-details-excerpt .sqs-add-to-cart-button');
        
        if (addToCartBtn) {
            console.log('Add to cart button clicked');
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                extractAndAddProduct();
            }, 300);
        }
    });
    
    // Monitor for dynamically loaded content
    const observer = new MutationObserver(function(mutations) {
        mutations.forEach(function(mutation) {
            if (mutation.addedNodes.length) {
                mutation.addedNodes.forEach(function(node) {
                    if (node.nodeType === 1 && node.querySelector && node.querySelector('.sqs-add-to-cart-button')) {
                        console.log('New product detected in DOM');
                    }
                });
            }
        });
    });
    
    observer.observe(document.body, {
        childList: true,
        subtree: true
    });
    
    console.log('Squarespace integration initialized');
}

function extractAndAddProduct() {
    // Check if this is a custom perfume context first
    const customPerfumeBlock = document.querySelector('#block-yui_3_17_2_1_1756603121810_791');
    const isCustomPerfumeContext = customPerfumeBlock && customPerfumeBlock.classList.contains('show');
    
    if (isCustomPerfumeContext) {
        // Handle custom perfume
        handleCustomPerfumeAddToCart();
        return;
    }
    
    // Regular product extraction
    const titleSelectors = [
        '.ProductItem-details-title',
        '.product-title',
        '.ProductItem h1',
        'h1.product-title',
        '.product-details h1',
        'h1'
    ];
    
    const priceSelectors = [
        '.ProductItem-product-price',
        '.product-price .sqs-money-native',
        '.sqs-money-native',
        '.product-price',
        '.price',
        '.ProductItem-details .sqs-money-native',
        '[data-product-price]'
    ];
    
    const imageSelectors = [
        '.ProductItem-gallery-slides img',
        '.ProductItem-gallery img',
        '.product-image img',
        '.gallery-image img',
        'img.product-image'
    ];
    
    let productTitle = '';
    for (const selector of titleSelectors) {
        const element = document.querySelector(selector);
        if (element && element.textContent.trim()) {
            productTitle = element.textContent.trim();
            break;
        }
    }
    
    let productPrice = '';
    for (const selector of priceSelectors) {
        const element = document.querySelector(selector);
        if (element && element.textContent.trim()) {
            productPrice = element.textContent.trim();
            break;
        }
    }
    
    let productImage = '';
    for (const selector of imageSelectors) {
        const element = document.querySelector(selector);
        if (element && element.src) {
            productImage = element.src;
            break;
        }
    }
    
    let variant = '';
    const variantSelect = document.querySelector('.variant-option select:not([data-variant-option-name="Select Variant"])');
    if (variantSelect && variantSelect.value) {
        variant = variantSelect.options[variantSelect.selectedIndex].text;
    }
    
    const productId = window.location.pathname + (variant ? `-${variant}` : '') + Date.now();
    
    productTitle = productTitle || 'Product';
    productPrice = productPrice || '0.00';
    
    console.log('Product data extracted:', { 
        title: productTitle, 
        price: productPrice, 
        variant: variant,
        image: productImage ? 'Found' : 'Not found'
    });
    
    addToCart(productId, productTitle, productPrice, productImage, variant);
}

// ===== CUSTOM PERFUME INTEGRATION =====
function initializeCustomPerfumeIntegration() {
    console.log('Initializing Custom Perfume Cart Integration...');
    
    // Store custom perfume data globally
    window.currentCustomPerfume = null;
    
    // Listen for custom perfume creation events
    document.addEventListener('customPerfumeCreated', function(e) {
        console.log('Custom perfume created:', e.detail);
        window.currentCustomPerfume = e.detail;
    });
    
    window.addEventListener('aquadorcyRevolutionaryPerfumeComplete', function(e) {
        console.log('Revolutionary perfume complete:', e.detail);
        window.currentCustomPerfume = e.detail;
    });
    
    // Fix for immediate add to cart clicks on custom perfume
    document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        const btn = e.target.closest('#block-yui_3_17_2_1_1756603121810_791 .sqs-add-to-cart-button');
        
        if (btn) {
            console.log('Custom perfume add to cart button clicked');
            e.preventDefault();
            e.stopPropagation();
            
            handleCustomPerfumeAddToCart();
        }
    }, true);
    
    // Check for stored perfume on page load
    const storedPerfume = localStorage.getItem('aquadorcyRevolutionaryPerfume');
    if (storedPerfume) {
        try {
            window.currentCustomPerfume = JSON.parse(storedPerfume);
            console.log('Loaded custom perfume data from storage');
        } catch (e) {
            console.error('Failed to load custom perfume data');
        }
    }
    
    console.log('Custom Perfume Cart Integration Ready');
}

function handleCustomPerfumeAddToCart() {
    // Get stored perfume data
    const storedPerfume = localStorage.getItem('aquadorcyRevolutionaryPerfume');
    
    if (storedPerfume) {
        try {
            const perfumeData = JSON.parse(storedPerfume);
            console.log('Processing custom perfume:', perfumeData);
            
            // Create properly formatted product
const customProduct = {
    productId: 'custom-perfume-' + Date.now(),
    title: `Custom Perfume: ${perfumeData.name}`,
    price: perfumeData.price || (perfumeData.volume === '50ml' ? 29.99 : 49.99),
    image: '',
    variant: `${perfumeData.volume} | Notes: ${perfumeData.composition.top}, ${perfumeData.composition.heart}, ${perfumeData.composition.base}`,
    quantity: 1,
    isCustom: true
};
            // Check if already in cart
            const existingIndex = cartItems.findIndex(item => 
                item.title && item.title.includes(perfumeData.name)
            );
            
            if (existingIndex === -1) {
                cartItems.push(customProduct);
                console.log('Added custom perfume to cart:', customProduct);
            } else {
                cartItems[existingIndex].quantity += 1;
                console.log('Increased quantity for existing custom perfume');
            }
            
            // Update cart
            updateCartDisplay();
            saveCartToStorage();
            showCartAnimation();
            
        } catch (e) {
            console.error('Error processing custom perfume:', e);
        }
    } else {
        console.warn('No custom perfume data found');
    }
}

// ===== KEYBOARD SHORTCUTS =====
function initializeKeyboardShortcuts() {
    document.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
        // Escape key
        if (e.key === 'Escape') {
            if (document.getElementById('cartSidebar').classList.contains('open')) {
                closeCart();
            }
            
            if (mobileMenuOpen) {
                closeMobileMenu();
            }
        }
        
        // Ctrl/Cmd + K for search
        if ((e.ctrlKey || e.metaKey) && e.key === 'k') {
            e.preventDefault();
            const searchInput = document.getElementById('searchInput');
            if (searchInput) {
                searchInput.focus();
            }
        }
    });
    
    console.log('Keyboard shortcuts initialized');
}

// ===== SCROLL BEHAVIOR =====
function initializeScrollBehavior() {
    let lastScrollTop = 0;
    let ticking = false;
    
    function updateHeader() {
        const header = document.querySelector('.custom-header');
        const scrollTop = window.pageYOffset || document.documentElement.scrollTop;
        
        if (scrollTop > lastScrollTop && scrollTop > 100) {
            // Scrolling down
            header.style.transform = 'translateY(-100%)';
        } else {
            // Scrolling up
            header.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
        }
        
        lastScrollTop = scrollTop;
        ticking = false;
    }
    
    window.addEventListener('scroll', function() {
        if (!ticking) {
            requestAnimationFrame(updateHeader);
            ticking = true;
        }
    });
    
    console.log('Scroll behavior initialized');
}

// ===== UTILITY FUNCTIONS =====
// Make functions globally available
window.addToCart = addToCart;
window.removeFromCart = removeFromCart;
window.updateQuantity = updateQuantity;
window.proceedToCheckout = proceedToCheckout;
window.openCart = openCart;
window.closeCart = closeCart;
window.extractAndAddProduct = extractAndAddProduct;
window.updateCartDisplay = updateCartDisplay;
window.saveCartToStorage = saveCartToStorage;
window.showCartAnimation = showCartAnimation;
window.handleCustomPerfumeAddToCart = handleCustomPerfumeAddToCart;

// Fix: Properly expose cartItems without reassignment
if (!window.cartItems) {
    Object.defineProperty(window, 'cartItems', {
        get: function() { return cartItems; },
        set: function(value) { cartItems = value; }
    });
}

console.log('Aquadorcy header script fully loaded and ready - Mobile Enhanced');
</script>
<script>
(function() {
  'use strict';
  console.log(' Aquadorcy Global Product Search initialized...');

  const CONFIG = {
    // IMPORTANT: Change '/shop' if your main store page has a different URL
    SHOP_PAGE_URL: '/shop',
    MIN_SEARCH_LENGTH: 2,
    SEARCH_DELAY: 300,
    MAX_RESULTS: 20
  };

  let allProducts = []; // This will store all your products
  let searchInput = null;
  let searchResults = null;
  let typingTimer = null;
  let activeIndex = -1;

  /**
   * Fetches all products from the shop's JSON data on page load.
   */
  async function loadAllProducts() {
    try {
      const response = await fetch(`${CONFIG.SHOP_PAGE_URL}?format=json`);
      if (!response.ok) throw new Error('Could not fetch product JSON.');
      const data = await response.json();
      allProducts = data.items || [];
      console.log(` ${allProducts.length} products loaded for global search.`);
      
      // Now that products are loaded, set up the search listeners
      setupSearchListeners();
      
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('Error loading products:', err);
    }
  }

  /**
   * Finds the search input and attaches all necessary event listeners.
   */
  function setupSearchListeners() {
    searchInput = document.querySelector('#searchInput');
    searchResults = document.querySelector('#searchResults');

    if (!searchInput) {
      console.warn(' Search input not found on this page.');
      return;
    }

    // Create results container dynamically if it doesn't exist
    if (!searchResults) {
      searchResults = document.createElement('div');
      searchResults.id = 'searchResults';
      // Ensure the parent is positioned to contain the absolute results
      if (searchInput.parentElement.style.position === '') {
         searchInput.parentElement.style.position = 'relative';
      }
      searchInput.parentElement.appendChild(searchResults);
    }

    // --- Event Listeners ---

    searchInput.addEventListener('input', (e) => {
      const query = e.target.value.trim();
      clearTimeout(typingTimer);

      if (query.length < CONFIG.MIN_SEARCH_LENGTH) {
        hideResults();
        return;
      }

      // Show a temporary loading state
      searchResults.innerHTML = `<div class="search-loading"><div class="spinner"></div><span>Searching...</span></div>`;
      showResults();

      typingTimer = setTimeout(() => {
        const products = findMatchingProducts(query);
        renderResults(products);
      }, CONFIG.SEARCH_DELAY);
    });

    searchInput.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
      const items = searchResults.querySelectorAll('.search-result-item');
      if (!items.length) return;

      if (e.key === 'ArrowDown') {
        e.preventDefault();
        activeIndex = (activeIndex + 1) % items.length;
        updateActiveItem();
        items[activeIndex].scrollIntoView({ block: 'nearest' });
      } else if (e.key === 'ArrowUp') {
        e.preventDefault();
        activeIndex = (activeIndex - 1 + items.length) % items.length;
        updateActiveItem();
        items[activeIndex].scrollIntoView({ block: 'nearest' });
      } else if (e.key === 'Enter' && activeIndex >= 0) {
        e.preventDefault(); // Prevent form submission
        const activeLink = items[activeIndex].getAttribute('href');
        if (activeLink) window.location.href = activeLink;
      } else if (e.key === 'Escape') {
        hideResults();
      }
    });

    // Close dropdown when clicking outside
    document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      if (!searchResults.contains(e.target) && e.target !== searchInput) {
        hideResults();
      }
    });
    
    // Also hide on focus out (for tabbing)
    searchInput.addEventListener('blur', () => {
        // We use a short timeout to allow a click on a result to register
        setTimeout(() => {
            if (!searchResults.contains(document.activeElement)) {
                 hideResults();
            }
        }, 200);
    });
    
    // Re-show on focus if there's text
    searchInput.addEventListener('focus', () => {
      if (searchInput.value.length >= CONFIG.MIN_SEARCH_LENGTH) {
         showResults();
         // Optionally, re-run the search
         const products = findMatchingProducts(searchInput.value.trim());
         renderResults(products);
      }
    });

    console.log(' Aquadorcy Global Product Search Ready');
  }
  
  /**
   * Searches the local 'allProducts' array for matches.
   * This is much faster than an API call.
   */
  function findMatchingProducts(query) {
    const lowerQuery = query.toLowerCase();
    
    return allProducts.filter(p => {
      const titleMatch = p.title.toLowerCase().includes(lowerQuery);
      const tagsMatch = (p.tags || []).some(tag => tag.toLowerCase().includes(lowerQuery));
      // You can also search the description, but it's slower
      // const bodyMatch = p.body.toLowerCase().includes(lowerQuery);
      return titleMatch || tagsMatch;
    }).slice(0, CONFIG.MAX_RESULTS);
  }

  /**
   * Renders the list of found products into the results container.
   */
  function renderResults(products) {
    activeIndex = -1; // Reset keyboard navigation index

    if (products.length === 0) {
      searchResults.innerHTML = `
        <div class="search-result-item no-results">
          <div>No products found</div>
          <small>Try another keyword</small>
        </div>
      `;
      showResults();
      return;
    }

    const html = products.map((p, i) => {
      // Use the correct JSON properties
      const imageUrl = p.assetUrl ? `${p.assetUrl}?format=100w` : ''; // Optimize image
      const price = p.sellingPrice ? p.sellingPrice.formattedValue : '';

      return `
        <a href="${p.fullUrl}" class="search-result-item" data-index="${i}">
          ${imageUrl ? `<img src="${imageUrl}" class="search-result-image" loading="lazy" alt="${p.title}">` : '<div class="search-result-image-placeholder"></div>'}
          <div class="search-result-content">
            <div class="search-result-title">${p.title}</div>
            <div class="search-result-price">${price}</div>
          </div>
        </a>
      `;
    }).join('');

    // Add the "View All" link
    searchResults.innerHTML = html + `
      <a href="${CONFIG.SHOP_PAGE_URL}" class="search-result-item view-all">
        <div class="search-result-content">
          <div class="search-result-title">View All Products</div>
        </div>
      </a>
    `;

    showResults();
  }

  function updateActiveItem() {
    const items = searchResults.querySelectorAll('.search-result-item');
    items.forEach((item, i) => item.classList.toggle('active', i === activeIndex));
  }
  
  function showResults() {
      searchResults.classList.add('active', 'product-search-active');
  }

  function hideResults() {
    searchResults.innerHTML = '';
    searchResults.classList.remove('active', 'product-search-active');
    activeIndex = -1;
  }
  
  /**
   * Injects the CSS for the search results.
   */
  function injectStyles() {
    const style = document.createElement('style');
    style.textContent = `
      #searchResults {
        position: absolute; top: 100%; left: 0; right: 0;
        background: white; border: 1px solid #ddd;
        border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.1);
        max-height: 400px; overflow-y: auto; z-index: 9999;
        opacity: 0;
        visibility: hidden;
        transform: translateY(5px);
        transition: opacity 0.2s, transform 0.2s;
        box-sizing: border-box; /* Prevents padding from breaking layout */
      }
      #searchResults.active {
        opacity: 1;
        visibility: visible;
        transform: translateY(0);
      }
      .search-result-item {
        display: flex; align-items: center;
        padding: 10px; text-decoration: none;
        color: #111; transition: background 0.2s;
        cursor: pointer;
      }
      .search-result-item:hover, .search-result-item.active { background: #f7f7f7; }
      .search-result-image { 
        width: 50px; height: 50px; 
        object-fit: cover; border-radius: 6px; 
        margin-right: 10px; 
        flex-shrink: 0;
      }
      .search-result-image-placeholder {
        width: 50px; height: 50px;
        border-radius: 6px; margin-right: 10px;
        background: #f0f0f0;
        flex-shrink: 0;
      }
      .search-result-content { 
        overflow: hidden; /* Important for ellipsis */
      }
      .search-result-title { 
        font-size: 14px; font-weight: 500; 
        white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;
      }
      .search-result-price { 
        font-size: 12px; color: #666;
        white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;
      }
      .view-all { justify-content: center; background: #f9f9f9; border-top: 1px solid #eee; font-weight: 600; }
      .no-results { display: block; text-align: center; }
      .no-results small { color: #777; }
      .spinner { 
        width: 16px; height: 16px; 
        border: 2px solid #ccc; border-top-color: #111; 
        border-radius: 50%; animation: spin 1s linear infinite; 
        margin-right: 8px; 
      }
      .search-loading { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; padding: 20px; color: #555; }
      @keyframes spin { from { transform: rotate(0deg); } to { transform: rotate(360deg); } }

      /* --- MOBILE STYLES (767px and down) --- */
      @media (max-width: 767px) {
        #searchResults {
          max-height: 60vh; /* Use 60% of viewport height */
        }

        .search-result-item {
          padding: 8px 10px; /* Tighter padding */
        }
        
        .search-result-image,
        .search-result-image-placeholder {
          width: 40px; height: 40px; /* Smaller images */
          margin-right: 8px;
        }
        
        .search-result-title {
          font-size: 13px; /* Slightly smaller text */
        }

        .search-result-price {
          font-size: 11px;
        }
      }
    `;
    document.head.appendChild(style);
  }

  // --- Main Execution ---

  // Wait for the DOM to be ready
  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
        injectStyles();
        loadAllProducts();
    });
  } else {
    // DOM is already ready
    injectStyles();
    loadAllProducts();
  }

})();
</script><script>Static.COOKIE_BANNER_CAPABLE = true;</script>

<div class="sqs-html-content" data-sqsp-text-block-content="">
  <h2 style="white-space: pre-wrap; transition-timing-function: ease; transition-duration: 1.5s; transition-delay: 0.413333s;" class="preFade fadeIn"><strong>Create Your Custom Scent</strong>&nbsp;</h2><p class="sqsrte-large preFade fadeIn" style="white-space: pre-wrap; transition-timing-function: ease; transition-duration: 1.5s; transition-delay: 0.426667s;">At Aquad'or, we invite you to craft a fragrance thats uniquely yours. Our personalized scent creation service lets you blend our exquisite collection of Dubai-sourced oils to design a perfume that reflects your individual style and essence. Whether you seek a bold statement or a subtle, refined aroma, we are here to guide you through the process, ensuring your custom fragrance is both exceptional and memorable. Experience the joy of creating a scent that is truly personal and distinctive, exclusively at Aquad'or.&nbsp;</p>

<div class="sqs-html-content" data-sqsp-text-block-content="">
  <h2 style="text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; transition-timing-function: ease; transition-duration: 1.5s; transition-delay: 0.466667s;" class="preFade"><strong>The Mind Behind Aquad'or</strong> <strong>M.K Fragrances </strong></h2><p class="sqsrte-large preFade" style="white-space: pre-wrap; transition-timing-function: ease; transition-duration: 1.5s; transition-delay: 0.48s;"> The vision behind Aquad'or is that of M.K Mahmoud, a perfumer who dreams of bringing a new level of Dubai-inspired luxury to Cyprus. After more than 15 years of experience and research in perfumery, M.K Mahmoud sought to merge his deep appreciation for Dubais opulent fragrance culture with Cyprus's refined tastes. His expertise and passion for exquisite scents are at the heart of Aquad'or, creating a unique perfume experience that reflects the elegance and sophistication of Dubai in every bottle we offer.</p>
</div>

  <script>
    (function() {
      'use strict';
      
      // Create floating particles
      const particlesContainer = document.querySelector('.perfume-particles');
      if (particlesContainer) {
        for (let i = 0; i < 15; i++) {
          const particle = document.createElement('div');
          particle.className = 'particle';
          particle.style.left = `${Math.random() * 100}%`;
          particle.style.animationDelay = `${Math.random() * 15}s`;
          particle.style.animationDuration = `${15 + Math.random() * 10}s`;
          particlesContainer.appendChild(particle);
        }
      }
      
      // Smooth scroll for footer links
      document.querySelectorAll('.footer-links a').forEach(link => {
        if (link.getAttribute('href').startsWith('#')) {
          link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
            if (target) {
              target.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' });
            }
          });
        }
      });
      
      // Intersection Observer for animations
      const observerOptions = {
        threshold: 0.1,
        rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
      };
      
      const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
        entries.forEach(entry => {
          if (entry.isIntersecting) {
            entry.target.style.animationPlayState = 'running';
          }
        });
      }, observerOptions);
      
      // Observe animated elements
      document.querySelectorAll('.footer-content, .footer-bottom').forEach(el => {
        el.style.animationPlayState = 'paused';
        observer.observe(el);
      });
      
    })();
  </script>
</div>
  
</div>
</div></div></div></div></div>
    </div>
  
  </div>
  
</section>

  
</footer>

/* ===== MOBILE MENU FIX STYLES ===== */
/* Fix 1: Re-enable user selection for mobile menu elements */
.mobile-toggle,
.mobile-toggle *,
.custom-nav,
.custom-nav *,
.nav-menu,
.nav-menu *,
.nav-link,
.dropdown-trigger,
.dropdown-item {
    user-select: auto !important;

    -moz-user-select: auto !important;
    -ms-user-select: auto !important;
    pointer-events: auto !important;
    -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent !important;
}

/* Fix 2: Ensure proper z-index stacking */
.custom-header {
    z-index: 9999 !important;
}

.custom-nav {
    z-index: 9998 !important;
}

.custom-nav.mobile-visible {
    z-index: 9998 !important;
}

#siteWrapper {
    z-index: 1;
    position: relative;
}

/* Fix 3: Override conflicting body padding */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    body.custom-header-active {
        padding-top: 60px;
    }
    
    body.menu-open {
        overflow: hidden !important;
        position: fixed !important;
        width: 100% !important;
    }
}

/* Fix 4: Ensure mobile nav is properly displayed */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .custom-nav {
        display: none;
        position: fixed !important;
        top: 60px !important;
        left: 0 !important;
        right: 0 !important;
        bottom: 0 !important;
        width: 100% !important;
        height: calc(100vh - 60px) !important;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff 0%, #f8f8f8 100%) !important;
        z-index: 9998 !important;
        opacity: 0;
        visibility: hidden;
        transform: translateY(-20px);
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
        overflow-y: auto !important;
        -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch !important;
    }
    
    .custom-nav.mobile-visible {
        display: block !important;
    }
    
    .custom-nav.active {
        opacity: 1 !important;
        visibility: visible !important;
        transform: translateY(0) !important;
    }
    
    /* Ensure mobile toggle is always visible and clickable */
    .mobile-toggle {
        display: flex !important;
        position: relative !important;
        z-index: 10000 !important;
        cursor: pointer !important;
        pointer-events: auto !important;
    }
    
    /* Fix dropdown interactions */
    .dropdown-trigger {
        cursor: pointer !important;
        pointer-events: auto !important;
    }
    
    .dropdown {
        pointer-events: auto !important;
    }
    
    .dropdown-item {
        cursor: pointer !important;
        pointer-events: auto !important;
    }
}

/* Fix 5: Remove any conflicting overflow hidden */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .custom-header {
        overflow: visible !important;
    }
    
    .header-container {
        overflow: visible !important;
    }
}

/* Fix 6: Ensure nav menu is scrollable on mobile */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .nav-menu {
        max-height: 100% !important;
        overflow-y: auto !important;
        -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch !important;
        padding-bottom: 50px !important;
    }
}

/* Fix 7: Override any section-specific hiding */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    section[data-section-id] {
        z-index: 1 !important;
    }
}

    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);

    z-index: 9999;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.cart-overlay.active {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
}

@media (min-width: 769px) {
    .nav-item > .nav-link {
        position: relative; /* Required for the pseudo-element */
        transition: color 0.3s ease;
    }

    /* Creates the yellow bar */
    .nav-item > .nav-link::after {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 5px; /* Position the bar slightly up from the bottom edge */
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        width: 0;
        height: 2px;
        background-color: #FFD700;
        transition: width 0.3s ease;
    }

    /* On hover, change text color and animate the yellow bar */
    .nav-item:hover > .nav-link {
        color: #FFD700; 
    }
    
    .nav-item:hover > .nav-link::after {
        width: 80%; /* Animate the bar to 80% of the link's width */
    }
}


/* 1 & 2. Mobile Logo and Icon Alignment Fixes */
